pages.text: You can now make some pretty badass $(item)Machinery$()! Good Job!$(br2)Now you might want something a bit more robust for $(item)Power Generation$(), a solid option at this point would be the $(item)Thermoelectric Generator$()$(br2)The $(item)Thermoelectric Generator$() mixes hot & cold liquids together to create power.

pages.title: Thermoelectric Mats
pages.notes: Don't forget to use $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$() if you're unsure of how to build the multiblock.

pages.title: 7: Industrial Power
pages.text: To see all of the $(item)Hot$() and $(item)Cold$() liquid combinations that produces $(item)Power$(), check out the uses of the Machine Blueprint$(br)(This item is not required to use the $(item)Generator$())
